casebody.data:
Sanfrey, Appellant, v. USM Corporation, d.b.a. True Temper Hardware Division, Appellee.

[Cite as Sanfrey v. USM Corp. (1991), 61 Ohio St.3d 718.]

(No. 91-329 Submitted July 31, 1991 Decided August 27, 1991.) Stewart Jaffy & Associates Co., L.P.A., Stewart R. Jaffy and Marc J. Jaffy; Lancione Law Offices and David Lancione, for appellant. McCaslin, Imbus & McCaslin, Thomas J. Gruber and Laura J. Murphy, for appellee.

This cause is reversed and remanded on authority of Brady v. Safety-Kleen Corp. (1991), 61 Ohio St.3d 624, 576 N.E.2d 722.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
